title: A STRANGE REQUEST - WTB Blemished/Altered Cards That Appear NM
author: poorlydrawncat

posts.post_title: A STRANGE REQUEST - WTB Blemished/Altered Cards That Appear NM
posts.post_content:
Due to my minimal budget and penchant for sharp cards, I've built a collection mostly around cards with glue stains on the back, small blemishes, near-invisible creases, hole-punches or trimmed edges--but that nonetheless retain a high degree of eye appeal (sharp corners, gloss, color, surface, etc.).  I don't care what set they're from, if they're $5 commons or high-end, $1000+ HOFers, graded or ungraded, if you have anything, I'm interested!

PM or email [url]poorlydrawncat@gmail.com[/url]

Here are some examples from my collection that illustrate what I'm talking about:

[URL=http://imgur.com/IwgPLWv][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IwgPLWv.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mZSHuLS.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WlZiB0P.png[/IMG]

Hey Brendan,

Nothing strange about a request like that to me!  You get visually appealing cards at a cheaper price.  :)  

Jimi
